entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient() is popping up a challenge for the system keychain on MacOS #99335
  • GetHostAddresses() on MacOS #99333
  • Can't use UIAutomationClient from console project manually referencing UIAutomationClient.dll #99310
  • [API Proposal]: A built-in collection for weak references #99308
  • Possible memory leak in .Net 8.0.2 #99304
  • [cdac] Implement `!PrintException` #99302
    9.0.0
  • [cdac] Enable the DAC to delegate operations to the cDAC #99301
    9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement basic data stream reader and writer in C #99300
    9.0.0
  • [cdac] Publish data stream spec #99299
    9.0.0
  • Portable Data Contract-based DAC in .NET 9 #99298
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Wrong directory outputed for publish #99292
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ParamCollectionAttribute #99285
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt][wbt] `Wasm.Build.Tests.BlazorWasmTestBase.BlazorRunTest` Current count: 0 #99283
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regressions in System.Linq.Tests.Perf_Enumerable 2/28/2024 9:23:39 AM #99318
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regression ObjectStringIsString #99314
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 48 Regressions on 2/27/2024 9:28:58 PM #99315
  • SmtpClient SendAsync Fails to send emails even thought it doesn't error #99276
  • EventAttribute Message not showing in ETW events #99274
  • Wasm SignalRClientTests timing out #99268

Closed

  • Internal CLR error in System.Reflection.FieldAccessor.GetValue #98998
    9.0.0
  • The Nuget package for System.Text.Encodings.Web v4.7.2 has the strong name of 4.0.5.1 #99326
  • [JITstressregs]: System.Numerics.Tensors tests SingleGenericTensorPrimitives and DoubleGenericTensorPrimitives failing #98718
    9.0.0
  • Stopping blazor debug session takes too long because of Script Document Node on Solution Explorer #98932
    9.0.0
  • Build failing with `WaitSubsystem.Unix.cs(347,26): error CA2265: Comparing a span to 'null' might be redundant, the 'null' literal will be implicitly converted to a 'Span<T>.Empty' ` #99330
  • [browser][MT] Assert failed: Cannot find Promise for JSHandle -2 #98406
    9.0.0
  • [System.Private.CoreLib] Compilation error: Comparing a span to 'null' might be redundant #99320
  • API change: remove StringBuilder.AppendLine (IFormatProvider ... #99307
  • JsonElement.GetInt32() fails when working with JsonElement directly #99229
  • Configure the certificate valiation from the environment variable #99217
    9.0.0
  • Interop.0.1 failing on gcstress pipeline #99001
    9.0.0
  • C# program stops at wrong line after IndexOutOfRangeException #97175
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 2 Regressions on 2/5/2024 11:10:25 AM #98175
    9.0.0
  • In a blazor wasm component, CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo("tr-TR").DateTimeFormat.DayNames returns not the Turkish names, but English day names #97252
    9.0.0
  • `HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering` seems to lack an implementation #60993
    Future
  • Localization issue with dates in Basque (eu-ES) in Blazor .NET 8 #99222
  • The error interaction between `String.EndsWith` and `\u0001` in .NET 8 #99279
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #88305
    9.0.0
  • Issue when creating and debugging self-contained single file #42927
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_63942/Runtime_63942/Runtime_63942.cmd #98971
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs test Decrypt_512_CekDoesNotDecrypt_FixedValue fails on Fedora 38 #95115
    9.0.0
  • GC stackwalking crashing on calli with generics #99253
    9.0.0
  • Warn when comparing spans to null #84265
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][wasm] Enable AOT driver mode on wasm on windows. #99334
    area-Build-mono
  • Skip EventPipe cleanup on mono unless runtime is shutting down #99332
    area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Fix doc comments #99331
    needs-area-label
  • Fix build break #99328
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Update branding to 8.0.4 #99324
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.18 #99323
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.29 #99322
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Super instrution tweaks #99319
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Simplify Environment.FailFast QCALL #99316
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Guarantee that initReg won't be a callee-saved register #99313
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Small clean up in assertprop (casts) #99311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed: null reference instead of assert on failed reflection in CookieExtensions #99309
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Fixed: potential null reference in XmlTreeGen when DataSet not defined #99306
    area-System.Data
  • [mt][browser] `SignalRClientTests` avoid timeouts on Windows #99303
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [browser][MT] fix nested synchronous JS interop call detection #99296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fixed: potential AV in MethodTableBuilder::FindDeclMethodOnClassInHie… #99295
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Support frozen structs for Swift pinvokes #99294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] OSR: Fix calculating remainingSPSize in genPopCalleeSavedRegisters #99288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Validate some reg homing logic #99286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_CC,CD #99284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] Set /DEBUGTYPE:CV,FIXUP on Windows binaries #99282
    area-Build-mono
  • CI test #99281
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [workload-testing] Add properties for nuget.config path, and target t… #99277
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix bugs related to jiterpreter heuristic #99273
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Delete unused System.Runtime.Versioning.CompatibilitySwitch #99270
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

Merged

  • Fix race condition in System.Reflection.FieldAccessor #99329
    area-System.Reflection
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Liveness and UpperVector Save/Restore #99093
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Schedule mono_wasm_resolve_or_reject_promise continuation to run asynchronously #99317
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove remaining BBJ_COND fallthrough fixups #99271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build break #99325
    area-System.Threading
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Fix handling of stack adjustments in prolog/epilog #99207
    arch-arm32, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make vectorizable checks more consistent in TrailingZeroCount operator #99305
    area-System.Numerics
  • SPMI: Remove double minus in perfscore #99312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugproxy] Invoke CDP endpoint to report error to telemetry #99254
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove use of POH for cryptographic primitives #99168
    area-System.Security
  • [mt][browser] Disable `SignalRClientTests` - timing out on Windows #99291
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Remove or document Unsafe.AsPointer uses in tests and miscellaneous code #99272
    needs-area-label
  • Revert "[wasm][workload] Require the workload for wasm threading" #99280
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Set edge likelihood in SetTargetEdge, SetKindAndTargetEdge #99269
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix exception callstack showing incorrect line number #98953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Remove the redundant check of DivideByZeroException for GT_UDIV/GT_UMOD in CodeGen::genCodeForDivMod(). #99215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Remove redundant check for DivideByZeroException for unsigned division/modulo #99228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Skip EventSource tests if process is not elevated #99261
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Enable building cross components from linux-arm64 #99252
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do not contain out-of-bounds local addresses #99195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove or document Unsafe.AsPointer uses in core libraries #99146
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix GC stackwalking for generic calli #99257
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Optimize Enumerable.OfType with custom iterator #99216
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_BV_2A #99049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Fix extra stack frame on exception stack trace #99263
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Avoid generating linker range extension thunks #99208
    arch-arm32, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() should respect [ActivatorUtilitiesConstructor] #99175
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Remove INS_SCALABLE_OPTS_SHIFT #99258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BP_1A to BQ_2B, BU_2A #99245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Try every ip address on host connection #99204
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Memoize some CngKey standard properties #99053
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Test on CI #99042
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Debug RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #98981
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix stack walking for new EH #99262
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix Promise cancelation race condition #99259
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix switching between single and multi threaded runtimes without clean #98607
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono]: Add support for callee saved XMM registers on Windows x64. #97326
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Use getUnrollThreshold() to get unroll limits #98798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete stackwalk cache #99137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
